page.description: The onAjaxCallbackFailed will fire if the server does not send a response back to the client within the default timeout period that the client waits for a response.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: xbasicFunctionName
property.description: The name of the Xbasic function that was called.

property.name: ajaxEvent
property.description: The name of the action that triggered the callback.
